title: Blue Malachite Development and Sampling
description:
See individual entries This piece is 99.1.1197.63a
Royal blue & purple warp. Lt & Drk grey weft. Plain weave variation. Left selvedge. \"1 shuttle\" & \"2 shuttle\" tags fastened to piece. Cut from larger piece, 99.1.1197.63b. a - (royal blue, purple, lt & dk grey
